### Key metrics and recommendations for AVD storage and ANF planning"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"summary"},"name":"SummaryTitle"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let timeRange = {TimeRange};
let avgReadLatency = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeRange)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Read"
| summarize AvgReadLatency = avg(CounterValue) * 1000;
let avgWriteLatency = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeRange)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and CounterName == "Avg. Disk sec/Write"
| summarize AvgWriteLatency = avg(CounterValue) * 1000;
let maxIOPS = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeRange)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and (CounterName == "Disk Reads/sec" or CounterName == "Disk Writes/sec")
| summarize IOPS = sum(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| summarize MaxIOPS = max(IOPS);
let maxThroughput = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeRange)
| where ObjectName == "LogicalDisk" and (CounterName == "Disk Read Bytes/sec" or CounterName == "Disk Write Bytes/sec")
| summarize Throughput = sum(CounterValue) / 1024 / 1024 by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| summarize MaxThroughput = max(Throughput);
let peakUsers = Perf
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeRange)
| where ObjectName == "Terminal Services" and CounterName == "Active Sessions"
| summarize PeakUsers = max(CounterValue);
union avgReadLatency, avgWriteLatency, maxIOPS, maxThroughput, peakUsers
| extend Metric = case(
    isnotempty(AvgReadLatency), "Average Read Latency (ms)",
    isnotempty(AvgWriteLatency), "Average Write Latency (ms)",
    isnotempty(MaxIOPS), "Peak IOPS",
    isnotempty(MaxThroughput), "Peak Throughput (MB/s)",
    isnotempty(PeakUsers), "Peak Concurrent Users",
    "Unknown"
)
| extend Value = coalesce(AvgReadLatency, AvgWriteLatency, MaxIOPS, MaxThroughput, PeakUsers)
| extend RecommendedANFTier = case(
    Metric == "Average Read Latency (ms)" and Value <= 1, "Ultra (sub-millisecond)",
    Metric == "Average Read Latency (ms)" and Value <= 4, "Premium (1-4ms)",
    Metric == "Average Read Latency (ms)", "Standard (up to 16ms)",
    Metric == "Peak IOPS" and Value >= 100000, "Ultra (450,000 IOPS)",
    Metric == "Peak IOPS" and Value >= 10000, "Premium (64,000 IOPS)",
    Metric == "Peak IOPS", "Standard (16,000 IOPS)",
    Metric == "Peak Throughput (MB/s)" and Value >= 1000, "Ultra (4,500 MB/s)",
    Metric == "Peak Throughput (MB/s)" and Value >= 100, "Premium (1,000 MB/s)",
    Metric == "Peak Throughput (MB/s)", "Standard (250 MB/s)",
    "Analysis Required"
)
| project Metric, Value = round(Value, 2), RecommendedANFTier
| order by Metric","size":0,"title":"ðŸ“ˆ Key Performance Metrics & ANF Recommendations","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Value","formatter":4,"formatOptions":{"palette":"redGreen"}},{"columnMatch":"RecommendedANFTier","formatter":18,"formatOptions":{"thresholdsOptions":"colors","thresholdsGrid":[{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Ultra","representation":"purple"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Premium","representation":"orange"},{"operator":"contains","thresholdValue":"Standard","representation":"green"},{"operator":"Default","thresholdValue":null,"representation":"gray"}]}}],"rowLimit":10}},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"summary"},"name":"SummaryMetrics"}]},"name":"SummaryGroup"}],"fallbackResourceIds":["/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/example/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/example"],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-UserAndEntity"}
